CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 12, 1962, pg. 21 reads: "The fourth, fifth, and sixth grades of the Robert L. Vann School are to present on Friday at 7:30 P.M. in auditorium, an opereatta [sic] entitled "Four Feathers West." Pictures from the scenes are shown in the photos...Fairy Army - The Fairy Army, always ready to protect the Queen against anyone except Bunkum, is shown above."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of twenty two boys wearing costumes, gathered on stage for performance of "Four Feathers West," Vann Elementary school
